content.json:
## Entra ID group inspector --- This report lists all actions exeuted on Entra ID groups.
Three tabs are available: 1. Creation/Deletion: info about groups created or deleted 2. Members: Members added to a group or removed from a group 3. Owners: Owners added to a group or removed from a group **For a better result, filter by group name**

parameters.name: WorkspaceName
parameters.query:
resources
| where name contains "{WorkspaceName]" and type == "microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"
| project name

parameters.name: GroupName
parameters.label: Group name
parameters.query:
workspace("{WorkspaceName:label}").AuditLogs 
| where Category contains "GroupManagement"
| extend JSON_Content=parse_json(InitiatedBy)
| extend userPrincipalName=JSON_Content.user.userPrincipalName
| extend ExecutedUser=case(
isnotempty(userPrincipalName), Usertest=userPrincipalName,
isempty(userPrincipalName), Usertest=Identity,
"Unnown")
| where ExecutedUser <> "Microsoft Substrate Management"
| where Identity notcontains "Microsoft Teams" and Identity notcontains "Office 365" and Identity <> "Viva Engage"
| where OperationName has_any ("Add member","Remove member")
| extend GroupName=case(
OperationName contains "Add member",  Group=tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(TargetResources[0].modifiedProperties))[1].newValue))),
OperationName contains "Remove member",  Group=tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(TargetResources[0].modifiedProperties))[1].oldValue))),
"Unnown")
| distinct GroupName

content.json: Click on Edit then type the workspace name in the WorkspaceName parameter !!!

content.query:
workspace("{WorkspaceName:label}").AuditLogs 
| where Category contains "GroupManagement"
| where Identity <> "Microsoft Teams Services" //or Identity <> "Microsoft Substrate Management"
| where OperationName contains "Add group" or OperationName == "Delete group"
| extend TargetResources = parse_json(TargetResources)
| mv-expand TargetResources
| extend GroupName = tostring(TargetResources.displayName)
| extend JSON_Content=parse_json(InitiatedBy)
| extend userPrincipalName=JSON_Content.user.userPrincipalName
| extend ExecutedUser=case(
isnotempty(userPrincipalName), Usertest=userPrincipalName,
isempty(userPrincipalName), Usertest=Identity,
"Unnown")
| where ExecutedUser <> "Microsoft Substrate Management"
| summarize Actions_count = count() by OperationName
//| project Date=ActivityDateTime,Action=OperationName,Group=GroupName,By=ExecutedUser
content.title: Audit count

content.query:
workspace("{WorkspaceName:label}").AuditLogs 
| where Category contains "GroupManagement"
| where Identity <> "Microsoft Teams Services" //or Identity <> "Microsoft Substrate Management"
| where OperationName contains "Add group" or OperationName == "Delete group"
| where OperationName has_any ({GroupSate})
| extend TargetResources = parse_json(TargetResources)
| mv-expand TargetResources
| extend GroupName = tostring(TargetResources.displayName)
| extend JSON_Content=parse_json(InitiatedBy)
| extend userPrincipalName=JSON_Content.user.userPrincipalName
| extend ExecutedUser=case(
isnotempty(userPrincipalName), Usertest=userPrincipalName,
isempty(userPrincipalName), Usertest=Identity,
"Unnown")
| where ExecutedUser <> "Microsoft Substrate Management"
| project Date=ActivityDateTime,Action=OperationName,Group=GroupName,By=ExecutedUser

workspace("{WorkspaceName:label}").AuditLogs 
| where Category contains "GroupManagement"
| where Identity <> "Microsoft Teams Services" //or Identity <> "Microsoft Substrate Management"
| where OperationName contains "Add member" or OperationName contains "Remove member"
| extend GroupName=case(
OperationName contains "Add member",  Group=tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(TargetResources[0].modifiedProperties))[1].newValue))),
OperationName contains "Remove member",  Group=tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(TargetResources[0].modifiedProperties))[1].oldValue))),
"Unnown")
| where GroupName has_any ({GroupName})
| extend TargetResources = parse_json(TargetResources)
| mv-expand TargetResources
| extend ItemType = tostring(TargetResources.type)
| where ItemType contains "User" or ItemType contains "Device" 
| extend UserName = tostring(TargetResources.userPrincipalName),DeviceName = tostring(TargetResources.displayName)
| extend JSON_Content=parse_json(InitiatedBy)
| extend userPrincipalName=JSON_Content.user.userPrincipalName
| extend Item=case(
isnotempty(UserName), UserName,
isnotempty(DeviceName), DeviceName,
"Unnown")
| extend ExecutedUser=case(
isnotempty(userPrincipalName), userPrincipalName,
isempty(userPrincipalName), Identity,
"Unnown")
| where ExecutedUser <> "Microsoft Substrate Management"
| summarize Members_Actions_count = count() by OperationName
content.title: Members audit count

parameters.name: Type
parameters.query:
workspace("{WorkspaceName:label}").AuditLogs 
| where Category contains "GroupManagement"
| extend JSON_Content=parse_json(InitiatedBy)
| extend userPrincipalName=JSON_Content.user.userPrincipalName
| extend ExecutedUser=case(
isnotempty(userPrincipalName), Usertest=userPrincipalName,
isempty(userPrincipalName), Usertest=Identity,
"Unnown")
| where ExecutedUser <> "Microsoft Substrate Management"
| where Identity notcontains "Microsoft Teams" and Identity notcontains "Office 365" and Identity <> "Viva Engage"
| where OperationName has_any ("Add member","Remove member")
| extend TargetResources = parse_json(TargetResources)
| mv-expand TargetResources
| extend ItemType = tostring(TargetResources.type)
| distinct ItemType

content.query:
workspace("{WorkspaceName:label}").AuditLogs 
| where Category contains "GroupManagement"
| where Identity <> "Microsoft Teams Services" //or Identity <> "Microsoft Substrate Management"
| where OperationName has_any ({GroupAction})
| where OperationName contains "Add member" or OperationName contains "Remove member"
| extend GroupName=case(
OperationName contains "Add member",  Group=tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(TargetResources[0].modifiedProperties))[1].newValue))),
OperationName contains "Remove member",  Group=tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(TargetResources[0].modifiedProperties))[1].oldValue))),
"Unnown")
| where GroupName has_any ({GroupName})
| extend TargetResources = parse_json(TargetResources)
| mv-expand TargetResources
| extend ItemType = tostring(TargetResources.type)
| where ItemType contains "User" or ItemType contains "Device" 
| where ItemType has_any ({Type})
| extend UserName = tostring(TargetResources.userPrincipalName),DeviceName = tostring(TargetResources.displayName)
| extend JSON_Content=parse_json(InitiatedBy)
| extend userPrincipalName=JSON_Content.user.userPrincipalName
| extend Item=case(
isnotempty(UserName), UserName,
isnotempty(DeviceName), DeviceName,
"Unnown")
| extend ExecutedUser=case(
isnotempty(userPrincipalName), userPrincipalName,
isempty(userPrincipalName), Identity,
"Unnown")
| where ExecutedUser <> "Microsoft Substrate Management"
| project Date=ActivityDateTime,['Target group']=GroupName,Action=OperationName,['Item type']=ItemType,['Item name']=Item,['Added by']=ExecutedUser
| order by Date

workspace("{WorkspaceName:label}").AuditLogs 
| where Category contains "GroupManagement"
| where Identity <> "Microsoft Teams Services" //or Identity <> "Microsoft Substrate Management"
| where OperationName contains "Add owner to group" or OperationName contains "Remove owner from group"
| extend GroupName=case(
OperationName contains "Add owner",  Group=tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(TargetResources[0].modifiedProperties))[1].newValue))),
OperationName contains "Remove owner",  Group=tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(TargetResources[0].modifiedProperties))[1].oldValue))),
"Unknown")
| extend TargetResources = parse_json(TargetResources)
| mv-expand TargetResources
| extend UserName = tostring(TargetResources.userPrincipalName),DeviceName = tostring(TargetResources.displayName)
| extend JSON_Content=parse_json(InitiatedBy)
| extend userPrincipalName=JSON_Content.user.userPrincipalName
| extend Item=case(
isnotempty(UserName), UserName,
isnotempty(DeviceName), DeviceName,
"Unknown")
| extend ExecutedUser=case(
isnotempty(userPrincipalName), Usertest=userPrincipalName,
isempty(userPrincipalName), Usertest=Identity,
"Unknown")
| where GroupName has_any ({GroupName})
| where ExecutedUser <> "Microsoft Substrate Management"
| where Item !contains "Unknown"
| summarize Owners_Actions_count = count() by OperationName
content.title: Owners audit count

content.query:
workspace("{WorkspaceName:label}").AuditLogs 
| where Category contains "GroupManagement"
| where Identity <> "Microsoft Teams Services" //or Identity <> "Microsoft Substrate Management"
| where OperationName contains "Add owner to group" or OperationName contains "Remove owner from group"
| where OperationName has_any ({OwnerAction})
| extend GroupName=case(
OperationName contains "Add owner",  Group=tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(TargetResources[0].modifiedProperties))[1].newValue))),
OperationName contains "Remove owner",  Group=tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(TargetResources[0].modifiedProperties))[1].oldValue))),
"Unknown")
| extend TargetResources = parse_json(TargetResources)
| mv-expand TargetResources
| extend UserName = tostring(TargetResources.userPrincipalName),DeviceName = tostring(TargetResources.displayName)
| extend JSON_Content=parse_json(InitiatedBy)
| extend userPrincipalName=JSON_Content.user.userPrincipalName
| extend Item=case(
isnotempty(UserName), UserName,
isnotempty(DeviceName), DeviceName,
"Unknown")
| extend ExecutedUser=case(
isnotempty(userPrincipalName), Usertest=userPrincipalName,
isempty(userPrincipalName), Usertest=Identity,
"Unknown")
| where GroupName has_any ({GroupName})
| where ExecutedUser <> "Microsoft Substrate Management"
| where Item !contains "Unknown"
| project Date=ActivityDateTime,['Target group']=GroupName,Action=OperationName,['Owner name']=Item,['Added by']=ExecutedUser
